pages.text: Advanced electrical wiring dropped by Cold Snap Zappers on occasion. Used to construct lightning transposers, the devices Zappers use to summon lightning on demand.
The lightning transposer, as used by the Cold Snap Zapper. Can be used in crafting, or you can shift-interact with one in your hand to summon lightning upon yourself.
A lightning transposer stuck to a snowball. The lightning transposer will activate when the snowball makes contact with anything.
